vulnerability_description: ReconWithMe has detected that the FTP server running on the remote host allows anonymous logins. Therefore, any remote user may connect and authenticate to the server without providing a password or unique credentials. This allows the user to access any files made available by the FTP server.
vulnerability_remediation: Disable anonymous FTP if it is not required. Routinely check the FTP server to ensure that sensitive content is not being made available.
impact: Anonymous logins are allowed on the remote FTP server.
